title: From the Mixed-up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler / The Westing Game
description: This unit's 12 lessons have students participate in creative reading, subjective responding, and journal writing; analyze setting, point of view, character, theme, and symbolism; discuss the use of humor and irony; and make connections to the fine arts. Grades 6-9. (CFL583)
author: Victoria Palisin
